body_html: @jubjamie Hi Jubjamie, thanks for your reply. However, my question is not about how to select the batch size during training, but about the batch size during testing. I found the output are complete different when the batch size are different during testing.

body: @jubjamie Hi Jubjamie, thanks for your reply. However, my question is not about how to select the batch size during training, but about the batch size during testing. I found the output are complete different when the batch size are different during testing.
